com.stylepoints.habittracker.model

Class Habit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stylepoints.habittracker.model.Habit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Id

    public class Habit
extends java.lang.Object
implements Id
    The model class for a Habit. Implements the Id interface so that it can be serialized and uploaded to Elastic Search. This class is automatically serialized by gson into JSON which is then stored locally, and uploaded to the server. Fields marked with transient are ignored by the serializer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Habit

        public Habit(java.lang.String type,
             java.lang.String reason,
             java.lang.String username)
      throws HabitReasonTooLongException,
             HabitTypeTooLongException
        Parameters:
        type - the type of habit. E.g., "Exercise"
        reason - reason for doing the habit. E.g., "to get healthy"
        username - username that this habit belongs to
        Throws:
        HabitTypeTooLongException - when the type is longer than the allowed max
        HabitReasonTooLongException - when the reason is longer than the allowed max

      • Habit

        public Habit(java.lang.String type,
             java.lang.String reason,
             java.lang.String username,
             java.time.LocalDate startDate,
             java.time.DayOfWeek... daysActive)
      throws HabitTypeTooLongException,
             HabitReasonTooLongException
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of habit. E.g., "Exercise"
        reason - reason for doing the habit. E.g., "to get healthy"
        username - username that this habit belongs to
        startDate - day to start working on this habit
        daysActive - days of the week to do this habit
        Throws:
        HabitTypeTooLongException - when the type is longer than the allowed max
        HabitReasonTooLongException - when the reason is longer than the allowed max

      • Habit

        public Habit(java.lang.String type,
             java.lang.String reason,
             java.lang.String username,
             java.time.LocalDate startDate,
             java.util.EnumSet<java.time.DayOfWeek> daysActive)
      throws HabitTypeTooLongException,
             HabitReasonTooLongException
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of habit. E.g., "Exercise"
        reason - reason for doing the habit. E.g., "to get healthy"
        username - username that this habit belongs to
        startDate - day to start working on this habit
        daysActive - the days of the week that we are scheduled to do this habit
        Throws:
        HabitTypeTooLongException - when the type is longer than the allowed max
        HabitReasonTooLongException - when the reason is longer than the allowed max

      • isActiveToday

        public boolean isActiveToday()
        Check if the habit is scheduled for this day of the week
        Returns:
        true if the habit is scheduled for today

      • shouldBeDoneToday

        public boolean shouldBeDoneToday()
        Check if this habit is active on this day, and if we have passed the start date
        Returns:
        true if we should do it today

      • hasValues

        public boolean hasValues()
        This function is used to ensure that habits that are deserialized actually have all of the required fields. Makes sure the Habit is not corrupted
        Returns:
        true if all required fields are not null
